funding-source.institution: NACOSA - NETWORKING HIV & AIDS COMMUNITY OF SOUTHERN AFRICA

funding-group.funding-statement: This work received support from The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria through Networking HIV and AIDS Community of Southern Africa (NACOSA) on behalf of The South African National AIDS Council (SANAC) and Department of Basic Education (DBE), and the Human Sciences Research Council (HSRC). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
